item.description:
Join us for delightful afternoon of playing games.

Time: 1:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Cost: We are expected to leave the place at least in as good shape as we got it. Everyone will be expected to help clean up.

Food: This is a potluck. Please bring an entree, dessert or drink to share. Alse please indicate what you plan to bring when you RSVP.

No alcohol or smoking is allowed.


http://www.lcnnh.org/...
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the play ground and come in the back door down the ramp.
item.name: Gamers Event: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meeting
